articles.author: Priyanka Shankar
articles.title: At least 39 killed in crowd crush at Indian actor-politician Vijay’s rally - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Vijay, a well-known actor who goes by only one name, launched a political party last year.
articles.content:
At least 39 people have been killed and more than 50 injured following a crush at a political rally held by Tamil actor Vijay, who is campaigning for election, state officials in India said.
So far,… [+2557 chars]
